policy_name: Users can view their own data
Users can update their own data
Users can view their own todos
Users can insert their own todos
Users can update their own todos
Users can delete their own todos
Users can view their own patients
Users can add patients to family groups
Users can view their family groups

policy_expression:
(EXISTS ( SELECT 1
   FROM patient_shares
  WHERE ((patient_shares.patient_id = patients.id) AND (patient_shares.shared_with_user_id = auth.uid()) AND (patient_shares.access_level = ANY (ARRAY['read'::text, 'write'::text, 'admin'::text])) AND ((patient_shares.expires_at IS NULL) OR (patient_shares.expires_at > now())))))

policy_expression:

  WHERE ((patient_shares.patient_id = patient_doctors.patient_id) AND (patient_shares.shared_with_user_id = auth.uid()) AND (patient_shares.access_level = ANY (ARRAY['read'::text, 'write'::text, 'admin'::text])) AND ((patient_shares.expires_at IS NULL) OR (patient_shares.expires_at > now()))))))

policy_name: Users can view shares they created
Users can view shares they received
Users can create shares for their patients
with_check_expression:
(EXISTS ( SELECT 1
   FROM patients
  WHERE ((patients.id = patient_shares.patient_id) AND (patients.user_id = auth.uid()))))
